linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: AMD Six-Core CPU or Intel Quad-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6450, Nvidia GeForce GT 460
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: AMD Six-Core CPU or Intel Quad-Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 290x, Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 Sp1 - 8 - 8.1 - 10 - 11
  • Processor: AMD Six-Core CPU or Intel Quad-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6450, Nvidia GeForce GT 460
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 11
  • Processor: AMD Six-Core CPU or Intel Quad-Core
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon 290x, Nvidia GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
